description: Introducing the Contentry.ai Browser Extension - your AI-powered content co-pilot that works on any webpage. Get real-time compliance analysis on LinkedIn, Twitter, email, and more without leaving your workflow.
details: Strategic Profile selection for brand-specific analysis
Side panel UI stays open while you type
Works on LinkedIn, Twitter, Gmail, CMS platforms, and more
Secure in-extension login with your Contentry.ai account
title: 🚀 New Browser Extension Released!
